course_description: A fast-paced 10-day intensive course focused on JavaScript-specific coding challenges and interview questions. Perfect for developers preparing for frontend/fullstack interviews at top tech companies.

unit_1.title: JavaScript Fundamentals Review
unit_1.description: Brush up on core JS concepts with practical problems

unit_2.title: String Manipulation Mastery
unit_2.description: Master string processing with JavaScript's powerful methods

unit_3.title: Hash Maps & Sets
unit_3.description: Leverage JavaScript's Map and Set for optimal solutions

unit_4.title: Mathematical Operations
unit_4.description: Handle edge cases in mathematical computations

unit_5.title: Midpoint Challenge
unit_5.description: Mixed problems to test your progress so far
